This website was created for the [2024 SICSS at the University of Florida](https://sicss.io/2024/florida/){target="_blank"} ERGMs component. Here, you will find three subpages with the following content: (1) Fundamentals about R and Statistics, (2) Introduction to ERGMs, (3) and Advanced ERGMs:

1. [Fundamentals about R and Statistics](/00-fundamentals)

2. [Introduction to ERGMs](/01-intro-to-ergms/)

3. [Advanced ERGMs](/02-advanced-ergms) 

In addition, a presentation about new topics in network modeling was presented during the 1st Chilean Summer School of Social Network Research. The slides are available at the following link:

4. [New topics in Network Modeling](/03-new-topics)


# Disclaimer

This is an ongoing project. The course is being developed and will be updated as we go. If you have any comments or suggestions, please let me know.
